name: Leaving Levaer
description:
High above the acid rains and wasteland underneath the clouds, a civilization continues to thrive. You live on the Island of Levaer, a large city with a society not far from our own.

As the days blur together, you one day decide to make the decision to follow your dreams and join an aircrew, to explore the skies.

NOTE: This game was made as part of 1 Game a Week and as an experiment to learn Twine.

Cover image source: https://pixabay.com/photos/isle-assembly-photo-montage-3011972/
